text: Cayuta is a town in Schuyler County, New York, United States. As of the 2020 census, 508 people lived there. There is also a hamlet inside the town, also named Cayuta. Cayuta occupies the southeastern corner of the county. It is northeast of Elmira. The town is part of the Elmira Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==Notable people== *William T. Lawrence, former US Congressman == Communities and locations in the Town of Cayuta == *Alpine Junction - A hamlet near the northern town line on NY-13 and NY-224. ==References== ==Other websites== * Brief early history of Cayuta Category:Towns in Schuyler County, New York
title: Cayuta, New York
